title: I can literally do everything in game except for autoing minons PLS READ N HELP

replies.body:
Hey there! Sorry to hear about the flaming and the rough time. :( 

It sounds like maybe the "Treat 'Target Champions Only' as a toggle" option might be enabled on your account. You can find it at the bottom of the _Game_ options menu under the _Gameplay_ group. This new option makes it so that the already existing "Target Champions Only" keybinding is treated as a toggle instead of a press-and-hold. By default, "Target Champions Only" is bound to backtick/tilde key (`, ~) but can be rebound in the keybindings menu.
